data.actual_result: Speech-to-Text remains active, capturing your voice
data.expected_result: When activating the Emoji picker, Discord should deactivate Speech-to-text, like it does when you try to attach an image
data.short_description: Activating Speech-to-Text on iOS prior to selecting the emoji picker keeps STT active
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable STT by pressing the microphone button near the spacebar - Activate the Emoji picker by pressing the 'smiley face' - Start/continue talking
